CustomField.description: Field used to determine if the current Scheduled Process is in a "running" state
CustomField.formula: ISPICKVAL (grax__Status__c, "Running") || ISPICKVAL (grax__Status__c, "Finding Data") || ISPICKVAL (grax__Status__c, "Backing Up Data") || ISPICKVAL (grax__Status__c, "Aborting") || ISPICKVAL (grax__Status__c, "Sending data to GRAX") || ISPICKVAL (grax__Status__c, "Waiting Files Backup to Complete") || ISPICKVAL (grax__Status__c, "Deleting Salesforce records") || ISPICKVAL (grax__Status__c, "Pending send data to GRAX") || ISPICKVAL (grax__Status__c, "Starting Archive Process")
CustomField.label: Is Running
